thread.title: Business Briefing: Apple and Cisco Team Up on iPhone and iPad Sales
thread.title_full: Business Briefing: Apple and Cisco Team Up on iPhone and iPad Sales

author: THE ASSOCIATED PRESS
title: Business Briefing: Apple and Cisco Team Up on iPhone and iPad Sales
text: Apple and Cisco Team Up on iPhone and iPad Sales By THE ASSOCIATED PRESS Continue reading the main story Apple is looking to Cisco Systems ’ expertise in Internet networking gear in its latest effort to sell more iPhones and iPads to corporate customers. On Monday, the two companies announced an alliance to ensure that corporate Internet connections relying on Cisco hardware deliver content quickly and securely to iPhones and iPads. Cisco will also help Apple develop ways for iPhones to interact more easily with workers’ office phones. Financial terms were not disclosed. Loading...
